description: This file defines a LitElement-based web component 'todo-list' for rendering and managing a list of todo items, including styles, rendering logic, and event handling.

classes.name: TodoList
classes.description: A custom web component extending LitElement that displays and manages a list of todo items.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the todo list, including toggle-all checkbox and list of todo items.

methods.name: #onToggleAllChange
methods.description: Handles change event for the toggle-all checkbox, dispatching a ToggleAllTodoEvent.
